tasks.instruction: Update the existing Event Check-In System code with the following changes: 1. Add option to upload QR code from gallery in addition to camera scan 2. Apply "Pravi Managers" branding with logo placeholder, brand colors, and modern typography 3. Redesign homepage with professional layout including hero section with title + tagline, three main cards (Register, Check-in, Dashboard) with icons and hover effects, clean footer with "© Pravi Managers" 4. Make UI polished, responsive, and different from standard templates 5. Keep code minimal, efficient, and fast-loading. Use existing Shadcn-ui, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS tech stack.
